com.rmr662.frc2012.component

Class Drive

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rmr662.frc2012.generic.Component
      • com.rmr662.frc2012.component.Drive

  • public class Drive
extends Component
    This class represents the drive wheels of the robot and knows how to control them so that they will adapt to a given target speed.
    Author:
    mcoffin
